name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Structured programming is a subset of procedural programming. It is also known as modular programming. It is a logical programming method that is considered a precursor to object-oriented programming (OOP).

name: Machine Learning
description: A data structure is a way of organizing the data so that it can be used efficiently. Here, we have used the word efficiently, which in terms of both the space and time.

name: Pattern Recognition
description: Object-oriented programming ( OOP) is a programming paradigm based on the concept of 'objects', which can contain data and code: data in the form of fields (often known as attributes or properties ), and code, in the form of procedures (often known as methods ).
